content.rendered:
Did you know many companies will match the philanthropic contributions of their employees? Gifts from employee’s spouses and retirees may also qualify for a match. Matching gifts are an easy way to double your impact and even count towards 1891 Society membership. You may use the search tool below to see if your employer participates in a matching gift program.

Please reach out to your Human Resources department if you don’t see your company listed below. Once you’ve submitted a matching gift claim, please contact us to let us know your matching gift is on the way.
